  • Field Details

    • faithTrack

      private int[] faithTrack
      It is a representation of the faithtrack. Every elements represents the victory points given by that cell

    • position

      private int position
      It represents the position of the player on the faith track

    • tiles

      private Tile[] tiles
      It is a representation of the FavorTiles of the player

    • deposits

      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> deposits
      It is a String representation of the situation of the player's deposits. For each deposits there is a value indicating the type of resource and a value indicating the amount

    • strongbox

      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> strongbox
      It is a String representation of the situation of the player's strongbox. For each resource, there is a value indicating its type and a value indicating its amount

    • leaders

      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> leaders
      String representation of the player's leadercards. For each card, there is a value indicating if it is active, discarded or available for action (activate/discard). And a String int for the id?

    • slots

      private java.util.List<int[]> slots
      Representation of the DevelopCards' slots of the player. Each card is represented by its id
